price: If We willed, We could drown them, then there would be no one to respond to their cry, nor could they be rescued,
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
